Title: The Helpful Gallaghers
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Mike O'Malley
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Carl heads off to cancer camp, while Frank agrees to be Jody's sex coach with Sheila. Fiona unites her coworkers. Lip and Mandy rescue her half-sister from foster care.
